directions: Beat cake mix, oil, soda, eggs, and first package of pudding until smooth.  Pour batter into greased 9 x 13 inch pan.
Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 minutes, or cake tests done.
Beat Dream Whip (TM) , milk, and pudding until stiff; pour over cooled cake.  Refrigerate.
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages instant pistachio pudding mix
title: Pistachio Cake II
